newsitem.title: JAPAN: Tokyo Nikkei down but just above 20,000 in morning.
newsitem.headline: Tokyo Nikkei down but just above 20,000 in morning.

text.p: Tokyo stocks were weaker in early morning trade on Thursday, as the market continued to be hurt by poor sentiment carried over from the previous day.
Brokers said that the market was still vulnerable and the Nikkei average could briefly fall below the key 20,000 level.
As of 0014 GMT, the Nikkei 225 average was down 76.86 points or 0.38 percent at 20,016.17. Its March futures were 70 points lower at 20,050.
